url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
node_code = #{nodeCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where node_id = #{nodeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_node set node_type = #{nodeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, node_name = #{nodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, node_code = #{nodeCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where node_id = #{nodeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
